title: Negotiate like the pros. Vol. 3
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Negotiation
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Negotiation in business
description: Never pay too much, settle for too little or give in too soon again! This seminar presentation with John Patrick Dolan looks at what to do when things break down. Learn the main reason negotiations break down, and how to prevent it, when arbitration is a good idea and how to negotiate a deal from a weak position.
